td.br: Recent Snohomish County Road Closure Information Updated Monday–Thursday 7:00am–4:30 pm

tr.td: Recent Snohomish County Road Closure Information — Last Update: 12:07pm April 9, 2020 (MORE THAN 1 HOUR OLD!)

div.div: The Snohomish County Road Closure Information Map is currently experiencing technical difficulties. We are aware of this situation and are currently working on a fix. The list of closures below the map remains unaffected. Please call (425) 388-7500 if you have any concerns about current road closures.

div.strong: Recent listing of roads closed under the jurisdiction of Snohomish County.
div.br:
Please be advised that all state routes and highways are maintained and reported on by the Washington State Department of Transportation and are NOT reflected on the Snohomish County Road Closure webpage. For information related to Washington State DOT maintained state routes and highways, please call the WSDOT automated information line at: 511 or visit their website at www.wsdot.wa.gov
No road closures have been reported at this time.

li.a: Long Term, Weight-Restricted, and Seasonal Road Closures

td.div: DISCLAIMER: This data is accurate at the time entered and does not necessarily represent current "up to the minute" conditions. Conditions can change rapidly during storms and flooding. Drivers are encouraged to exercise extreme caution and allow extra time. Road flooding or closures may occur between the time you view this data and you arrive at a particular road. Never drive through a road with standing water. Do not get out of your vehicle and approach downed trees or power lines.
